SpeedFeature.Name: Mobile
SpeedFeature.Text: You are exceptionally speedy and agile. You gain thefollowing benefits: • Your speed increases by 10 feet. • When you use the Dash action, difficult terrain doesn’t cost you extra movement on that turn. • When you make a melee attack against a creature, you don’t provoke opportunity attacks from that creature for the rest of the turn, whether you hit or not.
